features: Children's precious skin gets some much deserved TLC with our Lotus Blossom and Blueberry infused Sloth sheet mask!
Plus, cool sloth selfies are sure to put a smile on your face!
Cruelty Free - We love animals! For over 30 years 7th Heaven (Montagne Jeunesse) has stood against animal testing and as a founding CICAW member are proud that all our products are ‘Cruelty Free’.
description: Product Description The 7th Heaven Animal Sheet Mask Range Tiger Refresh tired skin Brighten, refresh and hydrate your skin with our apple and strawberry infused tiger sheet mask. Panda Hydrate and moisturise skin Hydrate and soothe your skin with our coconut and banana infused panda sheet mask. Kitten Soften and hydrate skin Soothe, soften and moisturise your skin with our cucumber and aloe infused kitten sheet mask. Unicorn Soothe and nourish skin Shine like a unicorn with our kid-friendly sheet mask featuring nourishing extracts from yuzu & dubia berry. Simply unic! Sloth Soothe and nourish skin Your precious skin gets some much deserved TLC with our lotus blossom & blueberry infused sloth sheet mask! Orangutan Nourish, hydrate and revitalise skin Go banana's with our hydrating & kind to skin orangutan printed sheet mask. Elephant Moisturise and calm skin Let out your wild side with our moisturising & kind to skin elephant printed sheet mask. Giraffe Soothe, hydrate and refresh skin Bring the fun back into skincare with our refreshing & kind to skin giraffe printed sheet mask. How To Use The video showcases the product in use.
